reviewText: I have seen this movie, but this was the first time in its entirety.  I thoroughly enjoyed it.  It was almost Hitchcockian, although the Sutherland character was no ordinary "everyman," but a high ranking member of the Polish Politburo during the Cold War.  Very underrated movie.  But deserving of the 5 stars given.

I bought this used in good condition. It was in decent condition, and I have enjoyed watching it many times. I only wish they would make this movie in a DVD format.  Perhaps I'm the only one who appreciates the quality of this movie.

The story is TRUE!  This is a small part of what a soul destroyng system does to it's own leaders.
Buy this film, show it to your friends and relatives.  This what Cuba, Veneuzuela, People's Republic of China and North Korea are today.
